casebody.data:
ROCKVILLE VOLUNTEER FIRE DEPARTMENT v. SIDNEY ROE GAITHERSBURG-WASHINGTON GROVE FIRE DEPARTMENT v. ELVIN BURDETTE [No. 141,

September Term, 1981.]

[No. 142,

September Term, 1981.]

Dismissed: March 1, 1982.

Submitted to Murphy, C. J., and Smith, Eldridge, Cole, Davidson, Rodowsky and Couch, JJ.

Appeals dismissed by counsel for appellants. Costs to be paid by appellants.
